name: Active Defense
desc: You solidly place yourself in your stance, preparing to intercept incoming strikes.
effect: Gain 3 _Grit_/_Reflex_/_Poise_ as well as 2 _Charges_ of _Redirect Force_. For the remainder of the _Round_, whenever you successfully make an Unarmed _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_], gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack.

name: Aggressive Posture
desc: You shift your stance, preparing to launch a sudden assault.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_. Until the end of the _Round_, treat all Techniques as if their _Speed_ was 1 lower for the purpose of _Counters_ and _Punishes_.
special: If you end this _Shift_ next to a foe, inflict _Impaired_ 1, _Marked_ (1 _Poise_). The creature is _Marked_ until the end of their next _Turn_.

name: Amplify Pulse
desc: You send a powerful pulse through the earth, learning about what is to come or amplifying it to devastate foes.
effect: Gain a _Seismic Sense_ in the Area until the end of the _Round_. Gain 1 _Poise_, then inflict _Insight_ 1 on all hostile creatures in the Area.
boost:
Choose one:
* 2 _Poise_/_Grit_: Instead, inflict _Insight_ 2.
* 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Inflict no _Insight_. Instead, remove each creature's topmost _Insight_ Token without resolving its effect then deal _True_ Damage equal to its _Value_.
imbue: 2 _Poise_/_Grit_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Apogee Dive
desc: You fire missiles to the sky with rapid precision, each of which falls like a diving hawk.
effect: Create three, non-adjacent Size 1 _Hazards_ within Range. You must have an _Arcing_ path to all spaces a _Hazard_ is created in. At the end of the next _Phase_ make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Arcing_, _Incoming_] against a creature in a _Hazard_, then remove that _Hazard_. Repeat this at the end of each _Phase_ until no _Hazards_ remain. Resolve all remaining _Hazards_ at the end of the _Round_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Make one additional _Hazard_. You may repeat this _Boost_, increasing its Cost by 1 each time. 
* 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_ (paid when a creature enters the _Hazard_): Immediately resolve the end of _Phase_ effect for the triggering _Hazard_, adding [_Glancing_]. This does not replace the end of _Phase_ effect.
* 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_ (paid when a creature enters the _Hazard_): As above, but remove [_Glancing_].

name: Armed Strike
desc: A strike making use of a weapon.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_.

name: Armorbane Strike
desc: Your weapon bites through armor, rendering it useless before your driving strikes.
effect: Attack using a _Wielded_ Hafted Weapon. You must target a creature's _Armor_. If you reduce the _Armor_'s _Durability_ to 0, gain 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: You have _Advantage_ on this Attack.

name: Avalanche
desc: You seize control of all nearby boulders, moving them in a violent wave.
effect: Use the _Interact_ of all Targets at a 2 _Grit_ discount, paying all costs separately. All _Boulders_ must move in the same direction, but move an additional 3 spaces. If you do not use an _Interact_, you may still move the _Boulder_ 3 spaces.
special: Any _Boulders_ that move to a lower _Elevation_ as a part of this _Technique_ deal +1 Damage.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: After resolving this Technique, destroy all _Boulders_ and attack with the below Profile in a _Cone_ 2 originating from the _Boulder_ in the same direction it was moved.

name: Blade Ward
desc: You tilt your blade defensively, providing yourself a dangerous guard.
effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_. You have _Advantage_ on your next _Bladed_ _Weapon Attack_ [_Parrying_].

name: Biting Slash
desc: You go for a vicious, rending slash focused on hindering a foe rather than an immediate kill.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. On a _Graze_+, add _Bleed_ 1 and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
special:
On a _Graze_+, you may decrease the Damage you deal to add additional effects:
* 1 Damage: Add _Bleed_ 1. You may use this effect 3 times.
* 3 Damage: Add _Hobbled_ 1.

name: Balanced Posture
desc: You shift your stance, settling into a deadly mix between offense and defense.
effect:
Gain any 2 _Grit_/_Reflex_, then consult the following effects.
* If you end this Technique with more _Grit_ than _Reflex_ gain 1 additional _Grit_ and gain 1 _Guard_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
* If you end this Technique with more _Reflex_ than _Grit_ gain 1 additional _Reflex_ and immediately take an additional _Step_.
* If you end this Technique with equal, non-zero amounts of _Grit_ and _Reflex_ gain 1 _Momentum_ and gain a +1 Bonus to your next _Counter_.

name: Battering Ram
desc: You put your head down, preparing to charge forth in a devastating blitz.
effect: Do not use your _Shift_ when you resolve this Technique. Draw a Line X _Hazard_, where X is your _Movement_. At the end of the next _Phase_ resolve your _Shift_ through this _Hazard_ (gaining 2 _Guard_ against _Punishes_), then  remove it. Deal 4 Damage and inflict _Dazed_ 2, _Angled Push_ 2 (2 _Reflex_/4 _Grit_) on any creature you move through. If a creature negates with _Grit_, end your _Shift_ prior to their space but deal full Damage to them. If a creature negates with _Reflex_, instead inflict _Angled Push_ 1 but the foe takes no Damage.
special: If you _Move_ before removing the _Hazard_, move the _Hazard_ with you.

name: Bounce Shot
desc: Your throw rebounds off of a throw, sending it rebounding into another creature.
effect: Make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_. Add _Dazed_ 1 on a _Hit_+ and increase the cost to Negate by 1. Additionally, after resolving the initial _Weapon Attack), make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against another creature within half the Weapon's Range of the Target.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: The secondary _Weapon Attack_ is not [_Glancing_]. Make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against another creature within half the Weapon's Range of the Target. You may repeat this _Boost_, but a creature may only be Attacked once in a single use of this Technique.

name: Bounding Run
desc: You charge forward, darting and leaping as you go.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. You may _Jump_ once during your _Shift_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: You may make an additional _Jump_ this _Turn_.
* 1 _Reflex_: Add [_Safe_ 1].
imbue:
Choose one:
* _Speed_ is instead 2, and _Move_ is _Dash_.

name: Building Form
desc: You integrate this strike into your stance, recovering and positioning yourself better.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_. Inflict no _Status_, but gain _Fleeting_ _Tokens_ equal to what the _Negate_ cost would be. These _Tokens_ must be _Momentum_ or a _Defensive_ Token used in the _Negate_.
boost: 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: The _Tokens_ are not _Fleeting_.

name: Butterfly Waltz
desc: You bide your time, carefully determining the safest path forward.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. Do not take any of your Movement yet. At the end of the _Phase_, take your _Movement_. Any creatures that did not act this _Phase_ take a -1 _Penalty_ to Attacks Rolls against you during this _Shift_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ (paid when using your Movement): Any creature that does not use a _Punish_ _Maneuver_ against you that you move adjacent to with your _Shift_ gains _Vulnerable_ 2.

name: Castle Wall
desc: Making use of a shield, you ready an unstoppable defense.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Create an _Arc_ adjacent to you. For the remainder of the _Round_ or until you _Move_, reduce the cost of all Maneuvers with 'Weapon: Shield' triggered by Attacks that pass through or originate from those spaces by 1. Reduce the cost of _Wide Guard_ by 2 instead.
special: Do not end the effect if you Move due to the Special of _Emperor's Phalanx Stance_ or _Vigilant Defender_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_ (paid at the start of a _Phase_ while the effect is active): You may move the _Arc_.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_ (paid when you Move): Do not end the effect. You may move the _Arc_ after moving.
imbue: 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Crushing Charge
desc: You bowl through foes, leaving them sprawling in your wake.
effect: If you move into a creature's space deal 2 _Damage_ and inflict _Prone_ (1 _Grit_/_Reflex_). If they _Negate_, they take half Damage.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ (when you move into a creature's space): Increase the cost to Negate by 1 and deal +1 Damage.
imbue:
Choose one:
* Speed is instead 3, and Move is _Reposition_ [_Breach_, _Rush_].
* Speed is instead 4, and Move is _Dash_ [_Breach_, _Rush_].

name: Crushing Weight
desc: You amplify your weight many times over, crushing the ground beneath your feet, causing foes to stagger towards you.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_ and _Hobbled_ 1. Inflict _Pull_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) in the _Area_, then make your space and all adjacent spaces _Rough_.
boost: 2 _Grit_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and add _Exposed_ 1.

name: Darting Posture
desc: You shift your stance, preparing to close with an incoming foe.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_/_Momentum_. Once before the end of the _Round_ when you end a _Turn_ adjacent to a foe, you may _Step_ [_Safe_ 1]. You must end this Movement further from the foe than you started it.
boost: 2 _Momentum_, paid when the Effect triggers: Use a 1 AP Single-Target _Strike_ against the creature, or a 2 AP Single-Target _Strike_, adding _Glancing_.

name: Debilitating Throw
desc: You embed a weapon in a foe, placing it so it will continue to impede a foe's offense.
effect: Make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_. Add _Embed_ on a _Hit_+ and increase the cost to Negate by 1. While this _Embed_ persists, at the start of each of the creature's _Turns_ inflict _Impaired_/_Exposed_ 1 (2 _Grit_) (your choice, decided when you inflict the initial _Embed_).
boost: 1 _Momentum_, paid at the start of the creature's _Turn_: Also inflict _Bleed_ 1.

name: Disarming Blade
desc: You strike out, limiting a foe's offense while still biting deep.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_]. On a _Graze_+, add _Disarmed_/_Impaired_ 2 and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 2.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Remove [_Glancing_].

name: Draw Bead
desc: You wait for the opportune moment, refusing to fire until the perfect opportunity.
effect:
Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Insight_ 2. Your Weapon is _Occupied_ while this effect persists. Starting at the end of this _Phase_, you may choose to either:
* Hold the shot.
* Make a _Weapon Attack_ against the creature if they are within your _Weapon_ Range.
When you make the _Weapon Attack_ deal +X Damage and add [_Sure Hit_ X/2, _Unblockable_ X/2], where X is the number of _Phases_ you held the shot.
boost: 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_ (paid at any time): Make a _Weapon Attack_ as if it was the end of a _Round_, then end this effect.
special: Every time you take Damage you must pay 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_ or end this Effect. If you Move, immediately end it.

name: Duelist's Bash
desc: You slam your shield forward, driving a foe back and solidifying your defenses.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Make a _Weapon Attack_. Deal no _Damage_, but add _Push_ 1 and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
special: If the Target is under the effects of _Raise Guard_, gain a +1 _Bonus_ to your _Attack Roll_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Inflict _Exposed_ instead of _Impaired_.

name: Defiant Charge
desc: You run forward with reckless abandon, prepared to lash out a moment's notice.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. You may not use any _Defend_ _Maneuvers_ during this _Movement_, but you may use as many _Counter_ _Maneuvers_ as you wish, but no more than one per creature.
special: Once this _Turn_, inflict _Impaired_ 1, _Marked_ (1 _Poise_) on a creature you move adjacent to. The creature is _Marked_ until the end of their next _Turn_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Repeat the _Special_. You may repeat this _Boost_.
imbue:
Choose one:
* _Speed_ is instead 2, and _Move_ is _Dash_.

name: Draw Stone
desc: You send your power out into the earth, preparing to erect hasty defenses.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_ and one _Charge_ of _Earthen Aegis_.
boost: None: Gain _Hobbled_ 1. Gain one additional _Charge_ and 1 _Grit_.

name: Driving Lance
desc: As you strike with your lance you force a foe back, halting their advance.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. Separate from the Status inflicted by the Attack, inflict _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_) on a _Graze_, _Push_ 1 (2 _Grit_) on a _Hit_, or _Push_ 2 (3 _Grit_) on a _Crit_. A creature may negate this _Push_ for no cost by taking Damage equal to the _Negate_ cost.
special: Gain 1 _Momentum_ if the Target is not in your _Reach_ at the end of your _Turn_.

name: Earthen Wall
desc: You pull the earth upward, coalescing it into a solid barrier.
effect: Gain 2 _Grit_. Create an _Earth Block_ in the Target space.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Create an additional _Earth Block_ in a Target space next to the first.
* 1 _Grit_: Replace an _Earth Block_ with an _Earth Pillar_.

name: Earthen Eyes
desc: You focus your senses entirely through the earth, ignoring all auxillary inputs.
effect: Gain _Seismic Sense_ in a _Burst_ 4 that moves with you. You are _Blinded_ until the end of the _Round_. While _Blinded_, you do not have _Disadvantage_ on Attacks against creatures within your _Seismic Sense_, and creatures within your _Seismic Sense_ do not have _Advantage_ on Attacks against you.
imbue: 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Echoing Wave
desc: You send a pulse of your senses out, learning even more when the wave returns.
effect: Gain _Seismic Sense_ in the _Area_ until the end of the _Round_, centered on yourself, then create a _Hazard_ in that area. Remove that _Hazard_ at the end of the next _Phase_. If you are still in the space you used this Technique from, inflict _Insight_ 2 on all enemies in the _Area_ on _Earthen_ Terrain. If you are no longer in the space you used this Technique from, instead inflict _Insight_ 1.
special: If you are in the space created for _Find the Pulse_, _Area_ is instead _Blast_ 7.

name: Example Technique
desc: A sample Technique to outline how to read it.
weapon: If this Maneuver makes or references _Weapon Attacks_ they must use this type of Weapon.
area: Area of Effect of the Technique
move: The distance you may Move with this Technique.
cost: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is played.
reqs: Requirements for using this Technique, typically the equipment you have Wielded.
effect: The primary effect of the Technique.
special: The secondary effect of the Technique.
boost: An optional effect with an associated cost that can be paid when the Technique is used.
imbue: An upfront cost typically for more powerful Techniques that must be paid when the Technique is played.

name: Finishing Blow
desc: You target a vulnerable foe, launching a vicious attack.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_. On a _Graze_+, resolve the creature's top two _Vulnerable_ Tokens instead of simply the topmost one. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Resolve an additional _Vulnerable_ as a part of this Attack. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times.

name: Flowing Strikes
desc: You make an elaborate attack, weaving movement and debilitating blows together.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_. After making all Attacks, you may _Condense_ one _Affliction_ inflicted by your Weapon on all Targets you _Hit_+. If you hit a creature multiple times you may _Condense_ a different Token with each _Hit_+.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Make an additional Attack. You may use this Boost multiple times, but increase its _Cost_ by 1 each time.
* 2 _Reflex_: Add a _Step_ [_Safe_ 1] _Shift_. You may use this Boost multiple times, but increase its _Cost_ by 1 each time.

name: Free Run
desc: You charge forward, leaping and tumbling across the field.
effect: Once this _Turn_ while adjacent to an _Obstacle_ of Size 1 or greater, you may _Jump_ up to 1 then _Roll_ 2 without expending any Movement, then gain 1 _Momentum_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Repeat the Effect on a different _Obstacle_. You may repeat this _Boost_, but increase the cost by 1 each time.
imbue:
Choose any:
* Speed is instead 2. Move is instead _Dash_.

name: Gentle Step
desc: You glide forward, sliding past foes as your feet barely touch the ground.
effect: Gain 1 _Reflex_. If you start a _Shift_ next to a foe, you may inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Poise_/_Reflex_).
imbue:
Choose any:
* No Cost: Add _Priority_.
* Speed is instead 2. Move is instead _Step_, _Reposition_.
* Speed is instead 3. Move is instead _Reposition_ [_Safe_ 1], _Reposition_ [_Safe_ 1].
* 2 _Reflex_/_Momentum_: This is 0 AP. This _Imbue_ must be selected at _Refresh_.

name: Greedy Soil
desc: You turn the solid earth to a messy liquid, slowing your foes.
effect: Make _Earthen_ spaces in the _Area_ _Rough_ while this _Enchant_ persists. Any creatures in _Rough_ spaces in the _Area_ when you use this _Technique_ and creatures that enter these spaces gain _Hobbled_ 1, _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Reflex_).
special: When you end this _Enchant_, inflict _Hobbled_ 1 (2 _Reflex_), _Staggered_ (Always) on all creatures in the in _Rough_ spaces in the _Area_ as the mud becomes solid once again.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Decrease the _Height_ of all _Obstacles_ in _Rough_ spaces in the _Area_ by 1 when you use this _Technique_, and at _Refresh_. If this reduces it to 0, remove it from the map.
* 1 _Poise_: Allies may ignore all effects of _Area_, but _Upkeep_ is instead 2.

name: Guardbreaker
desc: You attempt a heavy blow, one that will disrupt an enemy's guard.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ [_Pierce_ 1, _Unblockable_ 1]. On a _Graze_+, increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 and add _Dazed_ 1. Add _Vulnerable_ 1 (Always).
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Dazed_ 2 instead.

name: Heavy Charge
desc: You charge forward, using your armor as a weapon to smash through other creatures.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Gain 2 _Guard_ against all _Punishes_ this _Turn_. Inflict _Dazed_ 1 (1 _Poise_/_Reflex_) against all creatures you move through with your _Shift_.
imbue:
Choose one:
* Speed is instead 2, and Move is _Reposition_ [_Breach_, _Rush_].
* Speed is instead 3, and Move is _Dash_ [_Breach_, _Rush_].

name: Heavy Slam
desc: A powerful attack that relies on your armor's weight and protection.
effect: Gain +1 _Guard_ until the end of your _Turn_. Make a _Weapon Attack_. Before making your Attack Roll, you may _Wager_ up to 3 _Grit_, contested by _Grit_/_Reflex_. If you win, deal +3 Damage, add _Push_ 2/_Prone_, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, even on a Miss. If you lose and _Wagered_ at least 1, deal +1 Damage.

name: Heavy Thrash
desc: Your heavy armor carries your strikes forward, sending them careening through foes.
effect: Gain +1 _Guard_ until the end of your _Turn_. Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Unblockable} 1] against each Target in the Area. If no Targets are in the Area at the end of your _Turn_, gain 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_.

name: Heavy Uppercut
desc: You bring your hafted weapon up hard, potentially knocking a foe into the air.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. On a _Graze_+, add _Launching_ _Forceful_ _Push_ 1.  If you _Hit_+ you may instead add _Airborne_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: On a _Hit_+, inflict both and increase the _Push_ by 1. _Push_ as far as you want before the creature becomes _Airborne_. If they are still _Restrained_ at the end of the _Phase_, resolve the remainder, using the full _Launching_ value for the _Fall_.

name: Helm Splitter
desc: You strike with savage force, not discerning between foe and armor.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ [_Pierce_ 2, _Unblockable_ 1, _Sundering_]. Add _Dazed_ 1 and increasing the cost to Negate on a _Graze_+. The creature's _Armor_ or a piece of their Equipment loses _Durability_ equal to the Damage they take.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Increase your Damage to the Armor or Equipment by 2. If you would do Damage greater than the _Armor's_ remaining _Durability_, carry over half of the remaining Damage.

name: Hero's Duel
desc: You engage a foe in a heroic duel, compelling combat between the two of you.
effect:
The Target must Negate with 3 _Poise_. If they do not, grant them _Courage_ 2 and you and the Target become engaged in a Heroic Duel. While this _Enchant_ persists:
* When either Target would remove a _Courage_ Token they do not, but still gain all benefits.
* Both targets are _Marked_ by the other creature. This _Marked_ may not be removed in any way.
* If a creature ends their Turn more than 2 spaces from their Duel Partner, they lose _Momentum_ or _Defensive Tokens_ equal to their topmost _Courage_ Token.
* At the start of each of your _Turns_, gain 1 _Charge_ of _Heroic Exchange_.

This Enchant ends when one member of the Duel is _Defeated_, one of your allies attacks your Duel Partner, or you end your Turn more than 4 spaces away from your Duel Partner. If you _Defeat_ your Duel Partner, gain _Courage_ 3, then grant _Courage_ 3 to an ally within Range 6.

name: Hunter's Shot
desc: You take careful aim, firing a precision shot.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Sure Hit_ 1, _Pierce_ 1] with a +1 _Bonus_. On a _Hit_+, inflict _Insight_ 2.
special: Treat your _Artillery_ value as 2 higher for this Attack and double any _Penalty_ from adjacent foes.
boost: 1 _Poise_: If the Target is _Obscured_ you may add [_Glancing_] to ignore that condition.

name: Impaling Strike
desc: You attempt to run a foe through, impaling them with your strike.
effect:
Make an Attack with your Pole Weapon's Profile. On a _Hit_+, add _Embedded_ and increase the Cost to _Negate_ by 2. While _Embedded_:
* Your Pole Weapon is _Occupied_ and may only be used against this Target.
* The Target gains _Bleed_ 1 (2 _Grit_) at the start of each of their _Turns_.
* The Target gains _Bleed_ 1 for each space they move closer to you.
* You have _Advantage_ on all _Strikes_ using your Pole Weapon against the Target.
* On a _Graze_+ with your Pole Weapon against the Target increase the cost to Negate by 1 and add _Bleed_ 1.

This _Embed_ ends if the creature ends its turn out of your _Reach_.

name: Jagged Ridge
desc: The earth rises up in a vicious line, shredding through the soil.
effect: Make _Earthen_ spaces in the _Area_ _Jagged_. Attack [_Groundsource_] all Targets in _Earthen_ _Jagged_ spaces within the _Area_ with this Technique's Profile. If a space was _Jagged_ prior to this _Technique_, deal +1 Damage on a _Graze_+.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead of immediately Attacking, create a _Hazard_ in the _Area_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and resolve the _Attack_ against all creatures in the _Area_ with _Advantage_, adding _Hobbled_ 1 and [_Incoming_].
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, _Area_ is _Cone_ 3 or _Line_ 6.

name: Killing Path
desc: You focus on a foe, mentally tracking the most direct route to a killing blow.
effect: Choose a creature within Range. Inflict _Insight_ 2. In addition, regardless of if the creature Negates, your next Unarmed _Weapon Attack_ against the creature this _Round_ may treat their _Insight_ Tokens as _Exposed_. When used in this way, still gain any Tokens you would gain from removing the _Insight_.

name: Last Stand
desc: You fill a falling friend with courage, keeping them on their feet when they should fall.
target: Yourself or an ally within Range.
effect:
While this _Enchant_ persists, the creature gains benefits based on how much _Endurance_ they have remaining. Effects are cumlative unless stated otherwise:
* 100%: Target gains _Courage_ 1 at the start of the _Round_.
* 75%: Target instead gains _Courage_ 2 at the start of the _Round_.
* 50%: Target gains a +1 Bonus to Attack Rolls.
* 25%: Target gains 3 _Vigor_ at the start of each _Turn_.
* 0%: Target takes no penalties for being _Winded_. At the start of each of their _Turns_, the Target either gains _Courage_ 1 or increases the value of their topmost _Courage_ Token by 1.

This _Enchant_ ends if the Target ever has no _Courage_ at the end of their _Turn_.

name: Leading Strike
desc: You make a leading attack against a foe, removing other options and setting yourself up for a devastating counter.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_]. On a _Hit_+, inflict _Marked_ (Always). Your next _Counter_ with an Unarmed Weapon against the Target gains a +1 _Bonus_ and you gain 1 _Guard_ against the triggering Attack.

name: Leeching Roll
desc: You dart forward, nimbly rolling about and distracting any foes you move past.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. At any point in your _Shift_, you may _Roll_ your _Step_ distance. Inflict _Impaired_ 1 (1 _Poise_/_Reflex_) on all creatures you move through while _Rolling_ this _Turn_.
imbue: Speed is instead 2, and Move is instead _Dash_.

name: Lethal Hover
desc: You shift your stance, preparing to close with an incoming foe.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. Once before the end of the _Round_ when a foe enters a space you could end adjacent to with a _Reposition_, you may immediately _Reposition_ [_Safe_ 1]. You must end this Movement adjacent to them, but inflict _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Poise_) on them.
boost: 1 _Momentum_, paid when the Effect triggers: Gain a +1 to all Attack Rolls this _Turn_.

name: Lower Spear
desc: You prepare yourself for an attack, lowering your spear in preparation.
effect: Gain 1 _Poise_. Create a _Side Burst_ X, where X is your Weapon's _Reach_. All _Punish_ Maneuvers using your Weapon in these spaces have their Cost reduced by 1, and gain a +1 Bonus. All _Punish_ Maneuvers using your Weapon not in this Area have their Cost increased by 1 and take a -1 Penalty. This _Area_ lasts until you _Move_ or until the end of the _Round_.
special: If you _Reach_ changes, adjust the size of this Area.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Increase your Weapon's _Reach_ by 1, but you may no longer use _Punish_ Maneuvers with your Weapon outside this Area.
* 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_ (paid at the start of a _Phase_ while the effect is active): You may move the _Area_.
* 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_ (paid when you move): Do not end the effect. You may reposition the _Area_ after moving.

name: Maneuvering Thrust
desc: You use a spear strike to slip away from a foe, or grant an ally the same opportunity.
effect: Resolve the first _Shift_, then make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. After resolving this Attack, take your second _Shift_. You must end this Movement as far from all Targets as possible.
special: You may choose to not take the second _Shift_. Instead, after resolving this Attack, an ally adjacent to the Target may pay 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_ to _Step_ [_Safe_ 1]

name: Meteor Crash
desc: You gather the earth's strength in your legs before launching yourself to a terrifying height, crashing down like a meteor.
effect: Increase your _Jump_ value by 2 this _Turn_. Separate from your _Shift_ this _Turn_, you may make a single _Jump_. At the end of this _Jump_, make the Area _Veiled_, deal 2 _Crush_ Damage, and _Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_/_Reflex_) all creatures in it. If you land on a creature, instead deal 3 _Crush_ Damage and inflict _Slide_ 1, _Prone_ (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_); if they _Negate_, _Slide_ to the nearest unoccupied space.
imbue:
1 _Grit_: Add [_Priority_]. You may not _Jump_ or use any _Movement_ this Turn. Instead, increase your _Jump_ distance by 3. Make a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within your current _Jump_ distance, then end your _Turn_.
At the end of this _Phase_, Move [_Charge_, _Leaping_, _Safe_ 2] halfway to the _Hazard_, then become _Flying_.
At the end of the next _Phase_, Move [_Charge_, _Leaping_, _Safe_ 2] to the center of the _Hazard_. Deal 4 _Crush_ Damage and inflict _Push_ 2 (2 _Grit_/_Reflex_) on all creatures in the _Hazard_. If a creature is in the central space, instead deal 5 _Crush_ Damage and inflict _Slide_ 2, _Prone_ (3 _Grit_/_Reflex_); if they _Negate_, _Slide_ to the nearest unoccupied space. Remove the _Hazard_, then make those spaces _Veiled_ if you wish.
You may not willingly _Move_ while this _Hazard_ is present. If you are _Forcibly Moved_ at any point, move the _Hazard_ the same distance.

name: Outmaneuver
desc: You use your superior technique to put a foe off-balance, gaining the edge.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Warding_ 1]. On a _Hit_+ add _Slowed_.
boost: 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Add _Drain_ 1/2/3 on a _Graze_/_Hit_/_Crit_. You may _Drain_ _Momentum_ or a Token used to _Negate_ this Effect.

name: Piercing Lunge
desc: You prepare a heavy strike before lashing at lightning speed.
effect: Create a _Line_ X _Hazard_, where X is your Weapon's _Reach_+1. Your Weapon is _Occupied_ while this _Hazard_ exists. At the end of the next _Phase_, make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ against all creatures within the _Hazard_, dealing +1/+2 Damage on a _Graze_/_Hit_+.
special: If you are Moved, remove the _Hazard_ and gain 2 _Momentum_. If your _Reach_ changes, adjust the _Hazard_ accordingly.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, create a _Cone_ X _Hazard_.
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, immediately Attack.

name: Pinning Throw
desc: You attempt to pin a part of the creature to an obstacle, limiting their mobility.
effect: Make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Add _Embed_, _Hobbled_ 1 on a _Hit_+. If there is an _Obstacle_ adjacent and behind them in the _Attack Line_, instead add _Hobbled_ 2.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Do not inflict _Hobbled_. If you _Embed_ and there is an _Obstacle_ adjacent and behind them in the _Attack Line_, they are additionally _Stuck_ as long as they have this _Embed_. End the _Embed_ if the _Obstacle_ is destroyed.

name: Unarmed Strike
desc: A strike making use of any unarmed weapon.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_.

name: Point-Blank Shot
desc: You briefly utilize your ranged weapon as a melee one before firing off a point-blank shot.
effect: Attack with a Light, Medium or Heavy Improvised Weapon, depending on if your Weapon is Light, Versatile or Heavy. Add _Push_ 1, and increase the cost to Negate by 1. Make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_], halving its Range but treating its _Artillery_ value as 1 lower.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Remove [_Glancing_].

name: Pot of Sand
desc: You make a piece of ground softer in preparation for an incoming foe.
effect: Make the Targets _Rough_ and create a _Hazard_ there. When a creature moves into this space or ends their _Turn_ there, remove the _Hazard_ and inflict _Prone_, _Hobbled_ 1, _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Reflex_) as they sink into the ground. Regardless of if they _Negate_, immediately end their Movement. Remove the _Hazards_ at the end of the _Round_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Poise_/_Momentum_, paid when a creature triggers a _Hazard_: After the creature sinks into the ground you solidify the earth around them instantaneously. Instead, inflict _Prone_, _Restrained_. The creature may not clear _Restrained_ until they either Sacrifice an Action and spend 1 _Reflex_/Grit_, or give up two tiers of Movement and pay 2 _Reflex_/_Grit_.
* 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Do no create any _Hazards_. Instead, target a creature on an _Earthen_ space in Range. Make their space _Rough_, then inflict _Prone_, _Hobbled_ 1, _Exposed_ 1 (3 _Reflex_).

name: Prepare
desc: You take evasive maneuvers, raise your guard, ready your mind, or look for an opening to help you win this battle.
effect:
Choose one:
* Gain 2 _Grit_/_Poise_/_Reflex_/_Momentum_.
* Clear _Disarmed_. You may stop _Wielded_ Equipment of your choice but keep it _Equipped_, then _Wield_ any _Equipped_ Equipment, or _Wield_ or _Equip_ a single adjacent, un-_Equipped_ piece of Equipment.
* Clear _Staggered_. You may change your _Stance_, _Style_, or both.
* Choose a creature within Range 12. Inflict _Insight_ 2, _Scout_.
special: You may make the Movement of this _Technique_ None. Gain 1 _Grit_/_Poise_/_Reflex_/_Momentum_.
boost: 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Choose two different Effects.
imbue:
Choose one:
* +1 AP: Choose an additional Effect. You may choose the same Effect more than once.
* 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while Plotting.

name: Proclaim Invulnerability
desc: You issue forth a challenge, taunting those nearby with your unkillable nature.
effect: X is the number of hostile creatures within Range. If, by the end of the _Round_, one of these creatures has not dealt 4+ Damage to you with a single Attack, gain  X _Grit_/_Momentum_ (maximum 6).

name: Rain of Blows
desc: You unleash a rapid series of blows that, while barely damaging, are likely to inflict heavy status.
effect: Make three _Weapon Attack_s [_Combo_] with the same Weapon against a single Target, dealing half Damage. Instead of individually inflicting _Status_, inflict _Status_ using the highest of the Attack Rolls. Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1 for each additional _Hit_+.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Make an additional Attack. You may use this Boost multiple times, but increase its _Cost_ by 1 each time.
* 3 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Status_ twice, once using the highest Attack Roll, and once using the second highest Attack Roll. Increase the to _Negate_ for both by 1 for each _Hit_+ beyond these two.

name: Raise Guard
desc: You raise your shield against a specific foe, limiting their ability to assault you.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Choose a foe. For the remainder of the _Round_, reduce the cost of Maneuvers with 'Weapon: Shield' (called Shield Maneuver from here on) and increase your _Guard_ by 1 against all Attacks made by that foe. In addition, you may substitute _Grit_ for _Reflex_ when negating their Attacks if you use an Shield Maneuver. This effect ends if you use an Shield Maneuver against a different creature.
boost: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Rallying Cry
desc: You let out a shout, drawing your allies to you and raising their spirits.
effect: All allies in range may _Reposition_ Move, which they must use to _Shift_ closer to foes. If they were already adjacent to a foe they may not _Shift_, but gain _Courage_ 3, _Vigor_ 4. If they end this _Shift_ next to a foe they gain _Courage_ 2, _Vigor_ 2. Otherwise, they gain _Courage_ 1.

name: Rapid Shot
desc: You quickly unleashing a hail of missiles, sacrificing individual power for volume.
effect: Choose one: Either make 2 Ranged _Weapon Attacks_ [_Glancing_] against a single creature within half your Weapon's Range or make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] in a _Cone_ 3 with a Range of Self.
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Momentum_: Instead, either make 3 Attacks or Area is _Cone_ 4.
* 3 _Momentum_: Remove [_Glancing_].

name: Rapid Toss
desc: Your hands blur as you throw weapons, attacking with blinding speed.
effect: Make a Ranged _Thrown_ _Weapon Attack_ [_Sure Hit_ 1].
special: Versatile Weapons deal -1 Damage.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Repeat the Effect against the same Target. Deal +1 Damage for each successive _Hit_+. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times, increasing the Cost by 1 each time.

name: Readied Strike
desc: You prepare yourself for an incoming assault, shifting your defenses.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_/_Reflex_ and inflict _Insight_ 1 on a creature within Range. Once before the end of the _Round_ you may use both a _Defend_ and a _Counter_ in the same _Turn_ when Attacked by that creature. Gain a +1 Bonus to the Attack Roll of this _Counter_.

name: Ready Hand
desc: You ready yourself, preparing yourself to fling weapons out at a moment's notice.
effect: Gain 2 _Momentum_ and two _Charges_ of _Sentry's Throw_. Choose a creature within Range of an _Equipped_ _Thrown_ Weapon. Reduce the cost of _Sentry's Throw_ by 1 against them until the end of the _Round_ when using that _Weapon_.

name: Reckless Challenge
desc: You issue a brazen challenge, drawing the attention of foes and emboldening allies.
effect: Inflict _Marked_ (2 _Poise_) on all foes in the _Area_. Gain X _Vigor_, where X is the number of foes _Marked_ in this way, then grant _Courage_ 2 to up to X allies within Range.

name: Rippling View
desc: You focus your tremorsense outward, gaining insight into a distant area.
effect: Inflict _Insight_ 1 on all creatures of your choice within the _Area_. In addition, gain _Seismic Sense_ on the _Area_ as long as this Enchant exists. Any time a hostile creature ends their _Turn_ in the _Area_ increase their topmost _Insight_ Token by 1.
special: If you repeat this _Technique_ you may choose to increase the _Blast_ by 1, but add _Upkeep_ (1 _Poise_).
boost:
Choose any:
* 2 _Poise_: Remove the Enchant Keyword. The Area persists until you Move.

name: Run
desc: A simple dash, covering ground as quickly as possible.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Add [_Safe_ 1].
imbue: Speed is instead 2, and Move is instead _Dash_.

name: Second Wind
desc: You urge an ally to move forward, ignoring the pain of battle to push forward.
effect:
Grant the Target _Courage_ 1, then remove any amount of _Courage_ from the Target, distributed as you wish. Purchase below effects based on the total Value of _Courage_ removed:
* 1 _Courage_: Grant the Target 2 _Endurance_. You may choose this effect up to 3 times.
* 1 _Courage_: Remove 1 total value of _Dazed_, starting with the smallest Token. You may repeat this effect as many times as you wish.
* 2 _Courage_: Remove 1 total value of _Hobbled_, starting with the smallest Token. You may repeat this effect as many times as you wish.

name: Seeking Waves
desc: You send out a subtle, targetted shockwave, gleaning insight into a single foe.
effect: Gain 1 _Poise_. Inflict _Insight_ 3 (Always), _Vulnerable_ 1 (1 _Poise_) on a creature on _Earthen_ Terrain within Range. Until the end of the _Round_, so long as you are both on _Earthen_ Terrain, treat that creature as within your _Seismic Sense_.

name: Shield Bash
desc: You slam your shield forward, drawing a foe's attention and limiting their ability to attack others.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_. Add _Marked_.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. After resolving this Attack, you may _Condense_ the creature's _Impaired_.

name: Shield Charge
desc: You charge forward with your shield up, defending you from incoming assault.
effect: All _Punish_ Attacks against you treat you as _Covered_. Inflict _Impaired_ 1, _Angled Push_ 1 (1 _Grit_/_Poise_) on any creature you move through.
boost: 1 _Grit_: Inflict _Impaired_ 1, _Marked_ (2 _Poise_) on all creatures you end your _Shift_ adjacent to.
imbue:
Choose any:
* Speed is instead 3, and Move is _Dash_ [_Breach_, _Rush_].

name: Skyward Diversion
desc: You toss a weapon high in the air. While it has little force behind it, it does draw the eyes of all foes involved.
effect: Create a Size 1 _Hazard_ in a space you have an _Arcing_ path to within Range as you throw a Weapon upward. Inflict _Exposed_ 1 (2 _Poise_) on all creatures in a _Burst_ 1 around the _Hazard_. At the end of the next _Phase_ remove the _Hazard_ and make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Arcing_] against any creature in that space, using the _Thrown_ Weapon used for this _Technique_ and drawing the _Attack Line_ from where you initially used this Technique.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Momentum_: Remove [_Glancing_] from the Attack.
* 1 _Momentum_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (3 _Poise_) on a single creature within the _Hazard_.

name: Slamming Strike
desc: Your weapon makes heavy contact, slamming a foe into the ground with driving force.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. Add _Prone_ and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, or 2 if the _Attack_ would already inflict _Prone_. If the Target is knocked _Prone_, resolve the Attack as [_Glancing_] in a _Burst_ 1 centered on the Target.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: If the Target is knocked _Prone_, make the target's space and the _Burst_ _Veiled_.

name: Smash Back
desc: You make a launching strike against a foe, knocking them back forcefully.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. On a _Graze_+, increase the cost to Negate by 1, and add _Forceful_ _Push_ 1/2/3 depending on if the weapon is _Light_/_Versatile_/_Heavy_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_: Either increase the _Push_ by 1 or make the _Push_ _Launching_.

name: Stone's Resilience
desc: You set your feet, becoming an immovable object as you amplify your strength.
effect: Gain 3 _Grit_. You may not be _Forcibly Moved_ until the end of the next _Phase_. For the same duration, treat yourself as one Size larger for all effects, and increase the cost to _Negate_ _Engage_ by 1.
imbue: 1 _Grit_: Gain no _Grit_ from this Technique, but it is instead 0 AP.

name: Strength of the Earth
desc: An unchained strike, unleashing the might of an avalanche.
effect: Martial Arts Weapons treat their Speed as 1 higher. Make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Pierce_ 2, _Unblockable_ 2]. Make the target's space _Jagged_, add _Prone_/_Dazed_ 2, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1. Deal +1/2 Damage with _Versatile_/_Heavy_ Weapons.
imbue: +1 AP: Cost is instead 0. Weapon is instead Any and Speed is instead Weapon+1.
boost: 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_ (if you Imbued): Increase your Weapon's _Thrown_ value by 4. If the Weapon did not originally have _Thrown_, use the _Light Improvised Weapon_ profile for a _Light_ Weapon, _Medium Improvised Weapon_ for a _Versatile_ Weapon, or _Large Improvised Weapon_ for a _Heavy_ Weapon.

name: Spear Lock
desc: You assault a foe with a barrage of rapid strikes, trapping them in a cage of thrusts.
effect: Gain 1 _Momentum_. Inflict _Exposed_/_Impaired_ 1 (1 _Poise_) on the Target. Until the end of the creature's next _Turn_ your Weapon is _Occupied_, but, while the Weapon is _Occupied_, reduce the cost of the next _Punish_ using that Weapon by 2, and you have _Advantage_ on all Attacks made as a part of it.

name: Spearing Charge
desc: You charge forward rapidly, using your momentum to make your spear bite deep.
effect:
Resolve all Movement, then make a Melee _Weapon Attack_. If you moved at least 5 spaces:
* Deal +1 Damage.
* Add _Pierce_ 1.
* On a _Graze_+ add _Push_ 1 and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

name: Spire Strike
desc: You suddenly form the ground up into a spike, lancing it into a foe.
effect: Make a Size 1 _Earthen_ Obstacle within _Range_ a _Spire_. Make a _Melee_ Attack against a creature adjacent to the _Spire_'s Spike with this Technique's Profile.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Add [_Groundsource_] to the Attack. Instead, replace a _Jagged_ _Earthen_ space within Range with a _Spire_, then Attack a creature adjacent to the _Spire_'s Spike with this Technique's Profile.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: As above, but choose any _Earthen_ space.

name: Spring Dive
desc: You leap high into the sky before plunging down into a foe.
effect: Make a _Jump_, then make a _Weapon Attack_. If you ended your _Jump_ within your Weapon's _Reach_ of the Target, on a _Graze_+, deal additional Damage equal to half the distance you _Jumped_. If you end your _Jump_ in the Target's space you may move to the nearest unoccupied space without expending Movement or provoking _Punishes_ from this creature.
imbue: +1 AP: Weapon is instead Any and _Speed_ is instead _Weapon_.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: If you end your _Jump_ in the Target's space, instead deal additional Damage equal to the full distance _Jumped_, increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1, and you may add _Push_ 1.

name: Steady Guard
desc: You don't move quickly, but the protection offered by your armor more than compensates.
effect: Gain _Slowed_, 4 _Vigor_ and 2 _Grit_. Gain 1 _Guard_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
imbue: 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: This is instead 0 AP. This Imbue may only be used while _Plotting_.

name: Stoneguard
desc: You tear stone away, forging it into heavy armor for yourself or an ally.
effect: Choose an _Earthen_ Obstacle within Range. Inflict _Fragile_, then grant _Stone Armor_ (which is _Overarmor_), _Vigor_ 3, _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to a creature adjacent to the Obstacle.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Do not inflict _Fragile_ on an Obstacle. Instead, simply grant _Stone Armor_, _Vigor_ 3, _Hobbled_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to a creature in an _Earthen_ space within range.
* X _Grit_/_Momentum_ (maximum 3): Remove up to X value of _Burn_/_Frost_/_Shock_ from the Target.
imbue: 2 _Grit_: This is 0 AP. This _Imbue_ must be selected at _Refresh_.

name: Stone Citadel
desc: You lock down your armor's plates, harshly limiting your mobility but becoming indestructible.
effect: Gain _Hobbled_ 1, _Slowed_. Until the end of the _Round_, you have _Resistance_ to all _Ranged_ and _Area_ Attacks, reduce all _Forced Movement_ by 2, and allies may treat you as an Size 1 _Obstacle_ when they wish.
special: If you lose your _Stone Armor_, lose all benefits from this Technique.
boost: 2 _Grit_: You are _Stuck_ until the end of the _Round_. Increase the _Durability_ of your _Stone Armor_ by 2. Increase the _Guard_ of your _Stone Armor_ by 1 until the end of the _Round_.

name: Sword Dance
desc: You weave your blades to and fro, creating a deadly web of steel to distract a foe as you prepare to strike.
effect: Deal Damage as if you rolled a 5 on a _Weapon Attack_ in a _Burst_ 1. Creatures may Negate with 1 _Reflex_ to take half Damage. Until the end of the next _Phase_, creatures of your choice treat spaces adjacent to you as _Rough_, and your _Punishes_ that use a Bladed Weapon have their _Cost_ reduced by 1.
boost: 1 _Momentum_/_Reflex_: Instead, inflict _Exposed_ 2 (2 _Poise_).

name: Sword Waltz
desc: You prepare yourself, preparing to launch an elegant slashing assault.
effect: When you initially use this Technique, do nothing. At the end of the current _Phase_ resolve all Movement. Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against every creature that you move through or adjacent to.
special: If you do not use any _Techniques_ or _Maneuvers_ this _Phase_ before resolving this _Technique_, deal +1 Damage and add [_Safe_ 1] to your Movement.
boost:
Choose any:
* 3 _Momentum_: Remove [_Glancing_].
* 2 _Momentum_: Immediately resolve the Effect. You always gain the benefit of the _Special_ when using this Boost.

name: Tissue Scan
desc: You focus your senses on a foe, learning their weaknesses and how to exploit them.
target: A creature within _Range_ and on _Earthen_ Terrain.
effect: Inflict _Insight_ 2, _Insight_ 1 on the Target. If they do not _Negate_, also learn one of their _Stances_ and all Effects that it grants.
special: If the Target is within your _Seismic Sense_ you may either _Condense_ your _Insight_ on them or inflict an additional _Insight_ 1.
imbue: +1 AP: Repeat the _Effect_ against the same Target, and the _Special_ if applicable. Once before the end of the Round you may grant a single Attack against the Target _Advantage_.

name: True Courage
desc: You fill a creature's heart with courage, encouraging them to battle.
effect: Choose an ally within _Range_. Grant them _Courage_ 3, _Vigor_ 4. In addition, grant that ally 2 _Fleeting_ _Poise_. They may immediately use _Recover_, but may only remove _Dazed_ or _Fear_.
special: After using this Technique you may _Condense_ the target's _Courage_ Tokens.
boost: 2 _Poise_/_Momentum_: Repeat the effect for another ally within Range.

name: Volley Fire
desc: You fire a high, arcing barrage of arrows that hang before raining down on foes.
effect: Create a _Blast_ 1 _Hazard_ within Range that you have an _Arcing_ path to. At the end of the next _Phase_ make a Ranged _Weapon Attack_ [_Arcing_, _Glancing_, _Incoming_] against all creatures in the _Hazard_.
boost:
Choose any:
* 1 _Momentum_: Remove the _Hazard_ at the end of this _Phase_ instead.
* 2 _Momentum_ (when initially using the Technique): Remove [_Glancing_].

name: Vorpal Blade
desc: You make a vicious cut, and leaving several others that explode in a bloody spray.
effect: Make a _Weapon Attack_. The foe must immediately _Negate_ with 2 _Reflex_. If they do not, at the end of the _Round_, make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Glancing_] against the creature with the same Weapon, regardless of where you are or whether that Weapon is still _Wielded_ and ignoring _Covered_/_Obstructed_. On a _Hit_+, make a space of your choice adjacent to the creature _Veiled_ until _Phase_ 3 next _Round_.
boost: 2 _Momentum_: Resolve the end of the _Round_ effect two more times. It instead costs 3 _Reflex_ to _Negate_.

name: Warding Shield
desc: You place your shield in front of an ally, defending them from incoming assaults.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. Choose an adjacent ally. While you are adjacent that ally is always _Heavily Obstructed_ and you reduce the cost of _Vigilant Defender_ by 1 for this ally only. This Technique ends if you use your Shield in any way other than _Vigilant Defender_ for the target ally.
boost: 2 _Reflex_ (paid when the target moves): You may use the Special of this Technique again.
special: Once before the end of the _Round_, while this effect is active, when your ally _Shifts_ you may immediately take a _Step_ _Shift_, but must end it as close to your ally as possible. If you end this _Shift_ adjacent to them do not end this Technique.

name: Worldbreaker Strike
desc: You gather your strength before unleashing an earth-splitting strike.
effect: Move before resolving the rest of this Effect. Create a _Cone_ 2/_Burst_ 1 _Hazard_ if Melee, _Blast_ 1 within _Reach_ if _Reach_, or _Line_ 6 if _Thrown_/_Ranged_. This _Weapon_ is _Occupied_ while the _Hazard_ persists. At the end of the next _Phase_, if you have not moved, remove the _Hazard_ then make a _Weapon Attack_ [_Pierce_ 2, _Unblockable_ 2] against all creatures (excluding yourself) in the _Hazard_. Deal an additional 3 Damage (4 if _Heavy_), add _Prone_, and increase the cost to _Negate_ by 1.
imbue: +1 AP: Cost is instead 0. Weapon is instead Any and Speed is instead Weapon.
boost:
Choose one:
* 1 _Poise_: Instead, create a _Hazard_ in a single space within your Weapon's Range. Resolve the Attack with _Advantage_.
* 2 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, create a _Cone_ 4 or _Burst_ 2 if Melee, or _Line_ 12 if Thrown/Ranged.
* 3 _Grit_/_Momentum_: Instead, do not create a _Hazard_. Immediately resolve the Attack in that area.

Choose any:
* 1 _Grit_: Make two spaces _Jagged_/_Rough_ in the _Hazard_ when removed. You may use this _Boost_ multiple times.

name: Wrecking Paw
desc: Your weapon rends through the terrain, clearing a path before you.
effect: Make a Melee _Weapon Attack_ [_Siege_] against an _Obstacle_. If you _Destroy_ it, gain 3 _Grit_; otherwise gain 1 _Grit_. You may make the space of the _Destroyed_ Obstacle _Veiled_ until the end of the next _Phase_.
special: You may instead make a space within your _Reach_ _Rough_/_Jagged_ and gain 2 _Grit_.

name: Stone Guard
desc: The earth spirit pulls nearby stone to it, forming a tough shell.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. If you are on _Earthen_ Terrain or adjacent to an _Earthen_ Obstacle, also gain _Stone Armor_.

name: Stone Guard
desc: The earth spirit pulls nearby stone to it, forming a tough shell.
effect: Gain 1 _Grit_. If you are on _Earthen_ Terrain or adjacent to an _Earthen_ Obstacle, also gain _Stone Armor_.
